post_content: T206 Mickey Doolin-SGC 4-$170.00 delivered. Check or money order only-no electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" supersedes negotiations, requests for more information or additional scans. Please confirm via email at edhans@monkberry,com. No PMs, please. Larger pictures and other examples are on my newly updated website below. Thank you for looking.
